name: Warrant after summons issued
text: The district judge may, for any cause which appears to the district judge to be sufficient, at any time after the issue of the summons, and by virtue of the complaint therein contained and recited, issue the district judge's warrant for the immediate arrest, upon the charge, of the person so summoned. [L 1892, c 57, §21; RL 1925, §4010; RL 1935, §5473; RL 1945, §10773; RL 1955, §257-5; HRS §710-5; am L 1970, c 188, §39; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; gen ch 1985]
